help-file.title: "HOLY WORD"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: Yes Duration: Dependent on effect and proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
This good spell affects only those of evil alignment and can cause the following effects, dependent on the proficiency of the caster: kill, blindness, stun or massive damage. If the caster's alignment is evil, the spell can have nasty side effects.
